question.title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array II
prompt: Suppose an {{ array }} sorted in non-decreasing order is rotated at some pivot point unknown to you beforehand. You are given a rotated sorted array of integers {{ nums }} which may contain duplicates. Find and return the minimum {{ element }} of this array. The array may contain duplicates.

explanations: The original array is [0,1,2,2,2] rotated at the pivot of index 3 to become [2,2,2,0,1].

constraints: nums[i] is guaranteed to be a valid integer.
hints: Consider the worst-case time complexity for your solution.
Can the array have a single element?
